#summary Wordlist Module
#labels Phase-Support,modules

Reads values from a file.

= Options =

File Path i.e. (c:\wordlist\list.txt)


= Example =

You can use the following command to find hidden directories.

{{{
fsf.exe -m wordlist -o "c:\wordlist\directories.txt" -h 404 http://example.com/[FUZZ]/
}}}
